main.name: Ted Ahn
main.description: I have a big passion for programming and data analysis along side the rise of entertainment businesses and future of the tech industries
main.bio: Programming is my profession and my primary hobby. Connecting with new people in an aggressive and interprofessional environment is my dream. Being "customer-oriented" means work ethics are passion driven and personality is people driven.
main.contactmessage: Please Contact me through my email or phone number.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Science

testimonials.text: Technology is nothing. What's important is that you have a faith in people, that they're basically good and smart, and if you give them tools, they'll do wonderful things with them.
